Name: Glitzy Glow
Effect: Single Target. After dealing damage, activate a Force Field against Special Damage with a Duration of 4 Rounds on the User's side of the Field. If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails.
Description: The user surrounds itself with a glamorous light, releasing it as a psychic blast. The soft glowing particles remain in the field protecting its fabulousness.
